TopicTitle: More than one ship in the VAB

Articles.Content:
Can you develop more than one ship in the VAB at the same time. I have a 1st stage that I'm happy with but want to experiment with parts from others I've saved.

In other words, trying not to have to build "from the ground up" every time.

I have a pod with a lot of scientific stuff on it and a Science Jr below that and heat shield and engine and I'd love to save it into the Action Parts but can't figure out how. It seems not possible.

Do you mean using subassemblies?

What I did with my space stations is build them completely in the VAB, then dissasemble them into their component launchable parts, saved each of those as subassemblies, and then built the appropriate boosters for them... then launched them separately and assembled on orbit. You still need a root part for each, but a probe core works fine for that.
I guess that's what I mean. I don't see any thing on the left that says "subassembly". If I click on "Stage" I can light up on part of my lander but not the whole thing.

Staging is on the right. Click the little arrow in the upper left corner to turn on the advanced mode in the editor, the little rocket icon on the left hand sidebar is the subassembly tool. Edited November 16, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Typo
I've pre-built all of my rocket lifters up to 120 payload tons and saved them as subassemblies. They are incredibly useful.
